name: Hag's Hug
description:
You're the cat of an old hag who is trying to concoct a potion. The recipe, however, seems to involve you too.

Flee as fast as you can, break objects to distract her, and try your best to delay the inevitable: being caught!

She won't stop. She needs YOU! 

==========================

Controls KeyActionA / Left arrowGo leftD / Right arrowGo rightF / Left mouse clickNudge objects to tip them over and break themSpace barJump

==========================
